page.title: 16FARMING SAMPLE STUDIES
page.content: cont. from page 15 and 12 months of age.They are sold at York or Doncaster market to farmers who then fatten them and sell them to slaughterhouses. The farmer also keeps pigs.He has 11 sows in pig,1 boar and 66 young pigs. They are all Large White pigs.The pigs are kept in a piggery but the sows are put in sties to run with the boar.They are fed on compound pig meal.All the pigs are born on the farm and the ones the farmer sells are sold at Doncaster Market when they are 4 months old. These are bought by farmers who fatten them.A third of the farmer's income comes from livestock. The farmer employs 1 male full-time worker and 3 male part-time workers. All the machinery on the farm is owned by the farmer.On the farm there are 8 tractors,potato harvester,grass
